name: Styrene block copolymers with 1,3-butadiene, containing not less than 71 weight percent of polymer units derived from styrene, to which may be optionally added octadecyl 3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxyhydrocinnamate
FoodContactSubstance: Styrene block copolymers with 1,3-butadiene, containing not less than 71 weight percent of polymer units derived from styrene, to which may be optionally added octadecyl 3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxyhydrocinnamate (CAS Reg. No. 2082-79-3) at levels not to exceed 0.25 percent by weight of the styrene block polymer.
